Record.definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PRJ_BLB_UPDATE_TEAMS_SP" AS BEGIN LOOP UPDATE PRTEAM SET SLICE_STATUS = 1, HARD_SLICE_STATUS = 1 WHERE PRID IN ( SELECT t.prID FROM PRTeam t, INV_INVESTMENTS i, PRCalendar c, SRM_RESOURCES s, PRJ_RESOURCES r WHERE t.prResourceID = r.prID AND t.prProjectID = i.ID AND r.prCalendarID = c.prID AND r.prID = s.ID AND ( i.SLICE_STATUS = 2 OR r.SLICE_STATUS IS NOT NULL OR c.SLICE_STATUS = 2 OR s.SLICE_STATUS = 2 ) minus select t.prid from prteam t where t.slice_status = 1 and T.HARD_SLICE_STATUS = 1 ) AND ROWNUM <= 10000;
EXIT WHEN SQL%ROWCOUNT = 0; COMMIT; END LOOP; END;
